comment: Perfect so far
If you play any sort of role playing game, tabletop game, or miniatures game, this application is great to have in your pocket. Also works in a pinch to flip a coin!

title: Latest update broken
comment: For my purposes, I need to see the results of each die when rolling multiples. As a result, my formulas are entered as "d6+d6" rather than "2d6". QDR now crashes when trying to roll this. I deleted app data and tried to rebuild my bag, but it also crashes when trying to create dice with formulas like this.
I've just fixed the bug, new version should be available in a matter of hours. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

title: More than competent and is actively developed.
comment: I tried a few dice rolling apps, and this one is by far my favorite. It handles simple and complex dice rolling tasks. It still updates. This app is just wonderful. In my opinion, if you're going to get an app for rolling dice for tabletop games, this is the one you should use.

title: Critical Hit!
comment: This is the best dice roller I've used.  It is customizable, fairly intuitive, and fun to play with.  You can create multiple dice bags for different games or characters which is wonderful.    I love the audio notifications for crits and fumbles, but I wish it could be modified so that not every min and maxed die roll will trigger the sound effect.  I hope future updates will allow us to add backgrounds and other dice icons.

title: Excellent program
comment: Amazing dice rolling app.  One of the most customizable dice rolling programs I've ever seen. The author also was very quick at answering an email I sent about the app.

title: Exactly what I was looking for in a die roller
comment: Was getting tired of fighting the new players for dice, and tried quite a few dice roller programs before finding this one. This is the first to match my expectations. I love that it adds dice if clicked quickly and that you can add modifiers easily. Would love some dice color and pattern customization, given how gamers like their dice to suit them, but that's minor and would add size to an otherwise small install.

title: Easy
comment: Easy to use, direct no complex interface, even custom dice are easy to make!
Don
Please?

title: Awesome
comment: Great for Feng Shui RPG.

title: Perfect for Savage Worlds and Fate!
comment: This app easily allows you to get the higher of two rolls, each exploding, which is perfect for rolling a Trait Test with a Wild Die. You can also set up a single die to roll between -1 and +1 4 times (rak(rand(-1,1)4,4) for Fate games and add modifiers with the tap of a button. My only request is the ability to save dice bags across devices, perhaps as an exported file stored in Google Drive. I would love to select custom backgrounds, too.

title: Perfect!
comment: You can create dice bags for different dice sets (one set per character,  for example) and add custom named rolls with formulas to get the exact combinations you need. Example: Sneak attack 5d6,  Dagger with shock ((d4+1)+d6),  etc.   Saves rolls until you want to clear them. Screen can be moved around to make room to see more roll sets or more saved rolls. I haven't found a feature I was looking for that isn't in this app.  Well done. And free! I will be donating shortly though,  this app deserves it.

title: Bitchin'
comment: I'll give five stars if you add "13th Age" to your list of supported games ;)
It seems fair ;)
Nice straight forward app

title: Great App
comment: Great app for rolling dice, even better with 2.0 update.

title: It's just 4dF away from being the besterest.
comment: Unless there's a way to do it and I can't tell. Otherwise, this app is THE BIZ; Doc Rotwang! sez "Getchasome!"
There is a number of different way to make 4dF; the one I prefer is "rak(rand(1,-1),4,4)"
A very useful application that is very flexible. It is by far the best dice roller app that I have found, and the fact that its free and add free makes me like it even more.

title: So versatile
comment: I'm an old school player of 20+ years and I started using the app a week ago during our star wars saga edition game,  and while everyone was busy ordering dinner I was able to set up all my major rolls for ease of access,  from skill sets to combat and damage rolls,  showed it to everyone there and I'm pretty sure the whole room download it great app keep up the good work!

title: Excellent dice roller, haven't found anything that comes close
comment: Works as advertised and can be customized very easily.  I do have one request. A function that works like the Dystopian Wars (dwars) function but has an added parameter for how much the extra success is worth. Primarily I would like there to be no extra success value (but still explode upwards), but my making it a parameter it would be more versatile.
Good idea. In the meantime, if I understand it, try the Burning Wheel (bwheel) function: it adds no extra successes on rerolls.

title: The best I've found!
comment: This is the most powerful and flexible RPG dice app I've found so far.  Very impressed.  And the developer is extremely responsive.  Thanks again!

title: It sounded great n the description,
comment: but the features aren't actually there.  I named a dice bag and...  nothing happened, just stayed showing default.  I can't set it to roll multiple dice types.  There are no instructions to show you how to do anything, like use the vaunted features which may ,exist, but aren't evident.  Why is there a plus sign on two d6 in the top right?  It seems to be a useless toggle, simply changing the color of the plus sign.  Ugh.
I'm sorry to hear you can't find all the features. If you need help please write me or check the official community. In the meanwhile here a quick start guide: http://goo.gl/vYuI0H

title: Quick Dice Roller
comment: Excelleny dice app for all RPG's.
No Ads

title: Very Good App
comment: This app way exceeded my expectations. The only thing I could ask for is the ability to create custom formulas.  I play Exalted and the damage rolls don't generally count 10's as two successes.  Also, stringing together rolls is great but it would help if botches on a combined roll didn't lower the success total.  I was able to use the Burning Wheel formula to simulate Exalted damage but have yet to figure out how to get around the botch issue without programming an excessive amount of rolls to choose from.

title: Wonderful!
comment: Infinitely configurable dice with the exception of the dice icons (unable to add your own).  Works with any game system and even has several systems built-in for you!

title: Great app
comment: Very cool dice program.  The dice customization works well.

title: Excellent
comment: I love the ability to make custom dice! Excellent app for my D&D games.
Moving is Goood

title: OK, tedious
comment: You have to put in each and every roll.

The app contains a set of standard dice. Customized dice need to be added just once. To roll a die simply touch its icon (you don't need to enter it again!)
If you still need help feel free to send me a mail.

title: The most helpful I've used
comment: It may take a little while to get used to it, and you may have to figure out a few work arounds to get exactly what you want (for instance our group does DnD 3.5 character creation with 4d6 reroll 1's and 2's and I just decided to use the roll and keep using 4d4s with a +2 modifier), but once you get past that, you can do anything with it.  I'm very happy with this app.    The only complaint I might have is when I'm just trying roll one of my custom dice a bunch of times, I have to wait for it to cool down so it doesn't accumulate into one total.  If there was a check mark or a way to turn that off and on, that would be awesome.  Sometimes I just like spamming rolling, even with real dice, just to see what I get, and I don't really want a running total.  But again, awesome app!
Glad you like the app. You can disable automatic linking of results via app settings

title: Best Dice Roller I've Tried; Awesome Developer
comment: Quick Dice Roller is an awesome app!  It is easily the best amongst the dice rollers I have tested and the ability to quickly and easily create custom dice rollers for different things is awesome!  The developer is also very responsive and actually replied back to a direct email regarding a question I had.

title: Good app for regular players
comment: Fun and easy Can customize dice for character or weapons  Good recordings of session results     Would like more appearance variations   Don't mind the sounds as they can be disabled easily.  Worth the effort to set up. I like using this in Pathfinder games.

title: As simple or complex as you want it.
comment: Quick Dice Roller is simple and straightforward when you first load it up but, when you start adding custom dice formula is where the fun begins! The multiple functions may seem overwhelming but, the online help is quite detailed and the developer is quick to answer your questions if you have any. To top it off, the app is truly free as it has no ads and doesn't use more permissions than it needs. Minor UI challenges when editing dice and bags - like reliance on context menu items to move dice instead of dragging them - are the only things keeping me from giving this app a 5 star.

title: One of the *BEST* dice programs for Android.
comment: Very nice dice roller. One of the best I've demoed, certainly the most full featured and programmable. I play several different games: d20, Scion, Mage/Vampire (both oWoD and nWoD), Rifts, etc. And this lets me customize individual "bags" for each game and/or character.
I wish it could handle slightly more sophisticated dice options but its OK for basics.
Please contact me about those options

title: Excellent!
comment: Great for my gurps campaign. Not sure why it rolls twice in one result occasionally though.
If you quickly roll twice the results are linked. You can disable this feature or adjust sensitivity in the settings screen.
Awesome for game nights

title: Excellent
comment: This app is great, easy to custom and free!
Great Help.

title: Great app but
comment: The only thing I would add to this app is the ability to add the total dice rolled, not just like dice.  Do that and you have 5 stars

Please contact me via e-mail about this request.
Thanks

title: Very slick!
comment: I'm trying this out for my first Savage Worlds campaign.  SW makes heavy use of complex rolls that aren't easy to implement in the other dice rollers I looked at, e.g., roll both a d8 and a d6; both dies explode (if you get the highest value, roll again and add it to your total); pick the highest total from one die or the other but not both.  It only took me about an hour to figure out how to implement that in this app's very flexible language.  Now it's just one tap to roll the whole thing.  Great work!

title: Recommended
comment: I'm an avid role player so hearing the wah wah wah...when you roll a 1 is the greatest thing about this app

title: The best one available
comment: This roller is easily managed and simple to understand. Setting up dice bags is really easy!
Does exactly what I want... Flexible and powerful

title: Great App!
comment: I love being able to program all the various dice rolls for Pathfinder characters.  The only thing I would like would be to be able to see more than the first 6 characters of a die name.  It makes it tough to come up with names for multiple types of dice rolls.

This feature has been added since version 1.4.0
Thanks for the suggestion.

title: Simple, cool, does what I need!
comment: I love this!  I can easily set up every dice roll I make (skill check, damage etc.), and store these by game system (or even game, in each dice 'bag').  There are some groovy pictures to choose from, and I like the theme that's used.    The interface is great, very usable.  There are no ads, it seems lightweight enough (It runs and is perfectly robust on my S3).  The only down side is that it isn't 3D, so you can't see the dice tumbling on screen.   Best android dice app I've seen.

title: Simply Great
comment: The app still needs customization features, but is just so useful I had to give it 5 stars.  I want a jpg background user image, and mp3 user sounds.  What would really be nice if there were special user sounds for critical and fumble (user declared) range rules.

title: Fantastic, with one suggestion
comment: I really enjoy this app and plan to get all of my Android using friends to download it, but would it be possible to have an edit mode of some sort so you can easily drag and drop dice in the order / bag you want? That'd be cool.

title: Exactly what I need in a dice roller
comment: This program doesn't take long to learn, however it is quite versatile.  A must have for cons and impromptu gaming sessions.

title: Handy!
comment: I always have been using this app with my dungeon and dragons games. There's always that hilarious moment when you roll a '1'! Very well selected sound effects! "Wa - wa - waaaah!"

title: Works well except getting to dice bags on galaxy s4
comment: Using a Samsung Galaxy s4, it's really hard to open the dice bag menu. If you change it so they open with a swipe instead of tap, it probably would be easier. Other than that I really like it, simple and works well and fast.
The dice bag should open with a swipe gesture, too. Try swiping left to right from the left border. Please contact me if this doesn't work.
Versatile. Good.

title: Awesome
comment: Great dice app Downloaded a bunch and picked this one as it supports world of  darkness game system.  Good user support.  I suggested a new type of roll and development is looking into it already!

title: Nice customizable app
comment: This is a nice flexible die roller app. Do take a few moments to read the help to get the most out of it. Unlike Nathanael Cole my experience with the developer's was very pleasant and quick. He responded to a request I made in less that 4 hours and I wrote the comment before 6am my time zone. And I due use Dice Bag but this app tends to be more flexible. It allows a single roll and will give the output of the higher of exploding Trait and Wild die rolls.
Serious crap
Why so serious?

title: Nice!
comment: Please, add a d3.

Any dice can be added: Go to "Menu" then "Add Dice". Give any name you like and type "1d3" on field "Formula".
Have fun!
I don't care what anyone says. This app is excellent. If I could rate it 6 stars or more. I would. Thank you developer.
Awesome, just what I was looking for.

title: Natural 20!
comment: This is the only free dice App I've found so far that can easily handle dice for Legend of the Five Rings and Burning Wheel. It can handle your complex die problems. This is a great little app.

title: Awesome
comment: Best dice app by far!

title: Flexible, customizable, fun
comment: A labor of love, I don't doubt it. Can it handle Dogs in the Vineyard?

title: Eh... It's "okay"
comment: There are better free dice apps out there, with devs who actually appreciate the advice they solicit from their users without insulting them. I suggest "Dice Bag" or just plain "Dice."
I'm sorry that my words were misinterpreted, I always try to respond as best as can be seen from the other reviews

title: Great!
comment: A very nice, easily customizable dice roller. Very nice.

title: Love it!
comment: Solid program. Love the programmable die. Author quickly responded to email about app.

title: Perfect
comment: Exactly what I needed, customizable, easy to use, Cool looking...perfect!

title: Really nice
comment: Could use a it more dice functions however, or maybe more customization in the available ones.  Might I suggest a function for Hero dice body score? (d6: 6 is 2 successes, 5-2 is 1 success, 1 is 0 successes)

Support to hero body score has been added since version 1.3.3, se the function HERO.
Thanks for the suggestion.

title: Best No Question
comment: Best android dice roller.  Only one I've found that allows truly complex formulas.  I've been searching for an app that allows you to add multipliers to die rolls and finally found it!

title: Works on a Tablet
comment: I tried about a dozen dice apps before settling on this one as the best, for my needs at least. Great app!

title: Almost perfect
comment: Save multiple dice sets for character sheets would push this over the top!  Can't wait for the next batch of updates mentioned in your blog!

It is possible to save multiple dice sets since version 1.3.0.
Thanks for the suggestion!

title: Spot on
comment: The only thing that could make this better is customizable background (use your own pics) and same for dice. Maybe somewhere down the road, profiles for different games...with these three things I'd easily pay 3 or 4 dollars.

Customizable background is available since version 2.1.0.
Thanks for the suggestion!

title: Programmable
comment: Can program and save many kinds of dice rolls. Works with old and new world of darkness

title: Versatile!
comment: I run a number of tabletop RPGs and this program has met my needs with each one if them.
